text: <@U8THBCFC4> I think we already have the beta, Iâ€™d just not seen it. Thank you.
We get this all the time as well. We end up having to go in and update menus when we publish from the content staging area.
Hey <@UBFA10FMF> Wondering if you made any progress on this?  seems to be a widespread issue

Heya Ian, I've been having trouble reproducing this on my end for the page field. Here's my process, maybe you can clarify what I should change?

1. Add a module with a Link or URL field to a page. Select page A in the field.
2. Put page A through content staging, so the page id changes.
3. For the behavior you're reporting, I'm expecting the Link or URL field is pointing to the archived page A. However, on my end, the field points to the new ID automatically (something we put in a couple months ago).

Anything I'm missing here?
Nope, that seems to be exactly what I'm doing, but I'm ending up with a different result

if you check out this link: <https://www.visioncritical.com/events-0>

and then click on "TESTING EVENT FOR SUPPORT" you will see it's linked to an archive page
Okay cool. Passing this example onto the team, as it's certainly happening at some point.
